subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees overwhelmed Mariners closer David Aardsma for the second time in a week and rewarded Andy Pettitte, who worked eight innings to finish his All-Star first half at 11-2.
snippet: The Yankees overwhelmed Mariners closer David Aardsma for the second time in a week and rewarded Andy Pettitte, who worked eight innings to finish his All-Star first half at 11-2.
